actions.description: The dragon uses its Breath Weapon and makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half the spell’s level (rounded down)
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Your (the summoner's) spell attack modifier to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 + the spell’s level piercing damage
actions.name: Rend

actions.description: The dragon exhales a stream of multicolored energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw against the summoner's spell save DC, taking 2d6 damage of your choice of a damage type this dragon has resistance to on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one
actions.name: Breath Weapon

languages: Draconic, understands the languages its summoner speaks
name: Draconic Spirit [FTD]
resistances:
(Chromatic & Metallic only) acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison
(Gem only) force, necrotic, psychic, radiant, thunder
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., Passive Perception 12

specialTraits.description: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances. You have resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends
specialTraits.name: Shared Resistances
